jobDescription: Perform Raw Material testing as per applicable compendia and/or customer supplied test methods to support all LW manufacturing and development. Accurately generate data using validated test methods and SOPs in a cGMP environment.Demonstrate technical competence in the use of wet chemical techniques and instrumentation pertinent to the job purpose.Testing of chemical components or products using major laboratory instruments such as HPLC, GC, FTIR, UV-VIS spectrophotometer, pH meter, Viscometer, etc.Thoroughly review laboratory notebooks, ensuring compliance to test methods and specifications.Maintain training logs to comply with current SOP requirements.Ability to work in a team environment.Ensuring safety regulations are adhered to in the laboratory.Adhere to company policies.Other duties as assigned. Bachelor’s Degree (BA or BS) in Chemistry, Biology or related science required with a minimum of 2 years of relevant experience in the pharmaceutical industry; or equivalent combination of education and experience
